text: Mano nobedi tij ruodh Israel mondo misengini miwangʼo pep, chiwo mag cham kod misango miolo piny, Sawo mar Dwe manyien kod mago mag Sabato e kinde mag sawo moyier duto mag jo-dhood Israel. En ema obiro chiwo misengini mag golo richo, gi chiwo mag cham gi misengini miwangʼo pep kod misengini mag lalruok mondo olosgo yor pwodhruok ni dhood Israel.
